Articles.Content:
So, I'm probably not the only one. The new parts look great, but as someone who is used to the look of the old parts and has incorporated them into many old vessels I would like to maybe continue making a few.

Especially because of the added texture switcher, and the fact that the original textures are still in the game (just hidden, if you load the Kerbal X it looks normal) it shouldn't be too terribly difficult to reactivate these. And also they said they're going to deprecate the older parts at some point, so a mod that re-adds them to the menu would be great (and later on once they are gone, a mod that re-adds them entirely).
I also liked the old parts, and I'm the only one who liked the old texture for the 2.5m decoupler, so I would like the old ones as well

7 minutes ago, StupidAndy said:

I'm the only one who liked the old texture for the 2.5m decoupler

That is incorrect.

If you filter by cross section some (not all) of the old parts are available.

Edit: I don't know how close to the old parts these are but:

 

Edited March 10, 2018 by wasml
So there may not be that much but if you play on console, you can find old textures in the advanced sorting.
